subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A two-run blast in the seventh inning by Lagares, the ninth homer of his career, and a clutch double play in the eighth inning helped the Mets edge the Phillies.
snippet: A two-run blast in the seventh inning by Lagares, the ninth homer of his career, and a clutch double play in the eighth inning helped the Mets edge the Phillies.
